docblock.description: The properties, which are allowed for a transaction
The abstract MPay24Shop class provides abstract functions, which are used from the other functions in order to make a payment or a request to mPAY24
docblock.long-description:
TYPE: PARAMETER - VALUE(s), description
* STRING: STATUS - OK, ERROR * STRING: OPERATION - CONFIRMATION * STRING: TID - length <= 32 * STRING: TRANSACTION_STATUS - RESERVED, BILLED, REVERSED, CREDITED, ERROR * INT: PRICE - length = 11 (e. g. "10" = "0,10") * STRING: CURRENCY - length = 3 (ISO currency code, e. g. "EUR") * STRING: P_TYPE - CC, ELV, EPS, GIROPAY, MAESTRO, PB, PSC, QUICK, etc * STRING: BRAND - AMEX, DINERS, JCB, MASTERCARD, VISA, ATOS, HOBEX-AT, HOBEX-DE, etc * INT: MPAYTID - length = 11 * STRING: USER_FIELD * STRING: ORDERDESC * STRING: CUSTOMER * STRING: CUSTOMER_EMAIL * STRING: LANGUAGE - length = 2 * STRING: CUSTOMER_ID - length = 11 * STRING: PROFILE_STATUS - IGNORED, USED, ERROR, CREATED, UPDATED, DELETED * STRING: FILTER_STATUS * STRING: APPR_CODE

tag.name: author
tag.description: mPAY24 GmbH

tag.name: license
tag.description: EUPL, Version 1.1

docblock.description: The mPAY24API Object, with you are going to work

docblock.description: This is an optional function, but it's strongly recomended that you implement it - see details.
docblock.long-description: It should build a hash from the transaction ID of your shop, the amount of the transaction, the currency and the timeStamp of the transaction. The mPAY24 confirmation interface will be called with this hash (parameter name 'token'), so you would be able to check whether the confirmation is really coming from mPAY24 or not. The hash should be then saved in the transaction object, so that every transaction has an unique secret token.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID you want to make a secret key for

tag.name: param
tag.description: The amount, reserved for this transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The currency (3-digit ISO-Currency-Code) at the moment the transaction is created

tag.name: param
tag.description: The timeStamp at the moment the transaction is created

docblock.description: Get the secret (hashed) token for a transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID you want to get the secret key for

docblock.description: Get a list which includes all the payment methods (activated by mPAY24) for your mechant ID
Return a redirect URL to start a payment
Start a payment with customer profile
Start a payment with PayPal Express Checkout

Finish the payment, started with PayPal Express Checkout - reserve, bill or cancel it: Whether are you going to reserve or bill a payment is setted at the beginning of the payment. With the 'cancel' parameter you are able also to cancel the transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID in the shop

tag.name: param
tag.description: The shippingcosts for the transaction multiply by 100

tag.name: param
tag.description: The amount you want to reserve/bill multiply by 100

tag.name: param
tag.description: ALLOWED: "true" or "false" - in case of 'true' the transaction will be canceled, otherwise reserved/billed

docblock.description: Proceed the confirmation call

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID in the shop

tag.name: param
tag.description: A list with the arguments, provided with the confirmation

docblock.description: Get the transaction's current information - see details
docblock.long-description:
An array with all the data (by mPAY24) for this transaction (STATUS, CURRENCY, PRICE, APPR_CODE, etc) will be returned. Possible values for the STATUS attribute:
* RESERVED - in case the authorization was successful but not cleared yet * BILLED - in case the authorization was successful and amount was cleared * CREDITED - in case amount was credited * REVERSED - in case the transaction was canceled * SUSPENDED - in case the transaction is not fully compleated yet * NOT FOUND - in case there is not such a transaction in the mPAY24 database * ERROR - in case the transaction was not successful

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID (in your shop), for the transaction you are asking for

docblock.description: Clear an amount of an authorized transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID, for the transaction you want to clear

tag.name: param
tag.description: The amount you want to clear multiply by 100

docblock.description: Credit an amount of a billed transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID, for the transaction you want to credit

tag.name: param
tag.description: The amount you want to credit multiply by 100

docblock.description: Cancel a authorized transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID, for the transaction you want to cancel

tag.description: The transaction, which should be checked

docblock.description: Start a secure payment using a PROFILE (mPAY24 proSAFE), supported by mPAY24 - a customer profile (you have already created) will be used for the payment.
docblock.long-description: The payment window will not be called, the payment source (for example credit card), which was used from the customer by the last payment will be used for the transaction.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The order xml, which contains the shopping cart

docblock.description: Start a secure payment using a PayPal Express Checkout, supported by mPAY24 - the customer doesn't need to be logged in in the shop or to give any data (addresses or payment information), but will be redirected to the PayPal site, and all the information from PayPal will be taken for the payment.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The order xml, which contains the shopping cart

docblock.description: The class MyShop extends the abstract class MPay24Shop and implements some of the basic functions in order to be able to make a payment
docblock.long-description:
TYPE: PARAMETER - VALUE(s), description
* STRING: STATUS - OK, ERROR * STRING: OPERATION - CONFIRMATION * STRING: TID - length <= 32 * STRING: TRANSACTION_STATUS - RESERVED, BILLED, REVERSED, CREDITED, ERROR * INT: PRICE - length = 11 (e. g. "10" = "0,10") * STRING: CURRENCY - length = 3 (ISO currency code, e. g. "EUR") * STRING: P_TYPE - CC, ELV, EPS, GIROPAY, MAESTRO, PB, PSC, QUICK, etc * STRING: BRAND - AMEX, DINERS, JCB, MASTERCARD, VISA, ATOS, HOBEX-AT, HOBEX-DE, etc * INT: MPAYTID - length = 11 * STRING: USER_FIELD * STRING: ORDERDESC * STRING: CUSTOMER * STRING: CUSTOMER_EMAIL * STRING: LANGUAGE - length = 2 * STRING: CUSTOMER_ID - length = 11 * STRING: PROFILE_STATUS - IGNORED, USED, ERROR, CREATED, UPDATED, DELETED * STRING: FILTER_STATUS * STRING: APPR_CODE

tag.name: author
tag.description: mPAY24 GmbH

tag.name: license
tag.description: EUPL, Version 1.1

docblock.description: NOT IMPLEMENTED
docblock.long-description: This is an optional function, but it's strongly recomended that you implement it - see details. It should build a hash from the transaction ID of your shop, the amount of the transaction, the currency and the timeStamp of the transaction. The mPAY24 confirmation interface will be called with this hash (parameter name 'token'), so you would be able to check whether the confirmation is really coming from mPAY24 or not. The hash should be then saved in the transaction object, so that every transaction has an unique secret token.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID you want to make a secret key for

tag.name: param
tag.description: The amount, reserved for this transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The timeStamp at the moment the transaction is created

tag.name: param
tag.description: The timeStamp at the moment the transaction is created

docblock.description: NOT IMPLEMENTED
docblock.long-description: Get the secret (hashed) token for a transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID you want to get the secret key for

docblock.description: This is an optional function, but it's strongly recomended that you implement it - see details.
docblock.long-description: It should build a hash from the transaction ID of your shop, the amount of the transaction, the currency and the timeStamp of the transaction. The mPAY24 confirmation interface will be called with this hash (parameter name 'token'), so you would be able to check whether the confirmation is really coming from mPAY24 or not. The hash should be then saved in the transaction object, so that every transaction has an unique secret token.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID you want to make a secret key for

tag.name: param
tag.description: The amount, reserved for this transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The currency (3-digit ISO-Currency-Code) at the moment the transaction is created

tag.name: param
tag.description: The timeStamp at the moment the transaction is created

docblock.description: Get the secret (hashed) token for a transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID you want to get the secret key for

docblock.description: Get a list which includes all the payment methods (activated by mPAY24) for your mechant ID
Return a redirect URL to start a payment
Start a payment with customer profile
Start a payment with PayPal Express Checkout

Finish the payment, started with PayPal Express Checkout - reserve, bill or cancel it: Whether are you going to reserve or bill a payment is setted at the beginning of the payment. With the 'cancel' parameter you are able also to cancel the transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID in the shop

tag.name: param
tag.description: The shippingcosts for the transaction multiply by 100

tag.name: param
tag.description: The amount you want to reserve/bill multiply by 100

tag.name: param
tag.description: ALLOWED: "true" or "false" - in case of 'true' the transaction will be canceled, otherwise reserved/billed

docblock.description: Proceed the confirmation call

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID in the shop

tag.name: param
tag.description: A list with the arguments, provided with the confirmation

docblock.description: Get the transaction's current information - see details
docblock.long-description:
An array with all the data (by mPAY24) for this transaction (STATUS, CURRENCY, PRICE, APPR_CODE, etc) will be returned. Possible values for the STATUS attribute:
* RESERVED - in case the authorization was successful but not cleared yet * BILLED - in case the authorization was successful and amount was cleared * CREDITED - in case amount was credited * REVERSED - in case the transaction was canceled * SUSPENDED - in case the transaction is not fully compleated yet * NOT FOUND - in case there is not such a transaction in the mPAY24 database * ERROR - in case the transaction was not successful

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID (in your shop), for the transaction you are asking for

docblock.description: Clear an amount of an authorized transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID, for the transaction you want to clear

tag.name: param
tag.description: The amount you want to clear multiply by 100

docblock.description: Credit an amount of a billed transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID, for the transaction you want to credit

tag.name: param
tag.description: The amount you want to credit multiply by 100

docblock.description: Cancel a authorized transaction

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction ID, for the transaction you want to cancel

tag.name: param
tag.description: The transaction, which should be checked
